Prompts for discussion:

Exercise 1. Show that:
$$
F_n=\left\lfloor\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}} \cdot\left(\frac{1+\sqrt{5}}{2}\right)^n\right\rfloor
$$

(Source: [generatingfunctionology](https://www2.math.upenn.edu/~wilf/gfology2.pdf), Wilf; h/t Matthew Drescher and John Azariah for [a fun Twitter discussion](http://twitter.com/johnazariah/status/1691521731691966466) on this.)

Exercise 2. Use this method to work out a closed form for:

$$
y_{n+2}=2 y_{n+1}-y_n
$$

(Source: This is an exercise from the book.)
